values: It Will Be Worth It: Overcoming Obstacles to World MissionsIt Will Be Worth It: Overcoming Obstacles to World Missions

When it comes to missions, reasons abound to stay rather than to go. But for every apparent obstacle, countless promises say, “It will be worth it.”When it comes to missions, reasons abound to stay rather than to go. But for every apparent obstacle, countless promises say, “It will be worth it.”
